typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	hubName as string,
	satName as string,
	hashVal as string,
	TargetID as string
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	wildcardPaths:['*']) ~> DataVaultSource
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> HUBSource
DataVaultSource derive(hashID = sha2(256, byName($hashVal))) ~> hashKeys
Exists1 alterRow() ~> AlterRow1
hashKeys, HUBSource exists(hashID = DataVaultSource@hashID,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists1
HUBSource derive(hashID = byName(column_name, stream_name)) ~> DerivedColumn1
AlterRow1 select(mapColumn(
		{} = hashID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> HubLoad
